heroSection.title: The complete platform for trusted AI support
heroSection.description: Real-time, low-latency, accurate transcription of live audio that unlocks unlimited applications to engage consumers with multi-modal interactions.

feature1.title: Real-time Transcription
feature1.description: Industry-leading sub-750ms latency from speech to text

feature2.title: Multi-modal Integration
feature2.description: Seamlessly connect audio to interactive experiences

feature3.title: Plugin Ecosystem
feature3.description: Extend functionality with our growing library of plugins

codeExample.title: Exceptionally rapid support on all channels
codeExample.description: Experience lightning-fast transcription with our state-of-the-art platform that processes audio in real-time.

metrics.title: Next-gen quality and efficiency
metrics.description: Our platform delivers unmatched accuracy, reliability, and performance with ultra-low latency that enhances real-time applications.

workflow.title: Rethink work with the best AI workflow canvas
workflow.description: Our flexible system enables seamless integration with your existing workflows, making it easy to build custom applications.

deployment.title: Lightning fast deployment and results
deployment.description: Get up and running in minutes, not weeks. Our platform is designed for seamless integration and immediate value.

step1.title: Setup
features: Quick installation via NPM or CDN

bestResults.title: The best results happen when AI + human judgment come together
bestResults.description: Our platform enhances human capabilities rather than replacing them, creating a powerful synergy that delivers superior outcomes.
